google.description:

ğŸ”¥ Learn English Vocabulary Recite 10000 Words contains many word libraryğŸ“š, such as Oxford, Collins, IELTS, TOEFL, GRE, etc, the most one has 15000+ words, each word contains definitions, illustrations, pronunciations and example sentences to help you master new words quickly. ğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸ Learn English Vocabulary Recite 10000 Words' features:  Â
